links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-5) + a(n-6) + a(n-7). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 23 2011a(n) = sum(k=0..n/4, sum(j=0..k, binomial(j,n-5*k-j)*binomial(k,j))). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 16 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
